item.title: Demoing Knative Serving and Eventing using Demo-Magic-Scripts
item.author: robert.guske@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Robert Guske
item.description: Knative is the most popular platform to run Serverless workload on Kubernetes and to build event-driven architectures. This posts introduces two demo-scripts which will support you when presenting on Knative's power in the mentioned disciplines.
